name: Invoice Report New
query:
SELECT `tabPurchase Invoice`.supplier as "Entity:Link/Supplier:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.posting_date as "Invoice Date:Date:120",
         cn.name AS "Credit Note Number:Link/Purchase Invoice:120",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.name as "Invoice Number:Link/Purchase Invoice:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice Item`.item_group as "Product Category:Link/Item Group:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.total as "Gross Amount:Currency:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_5_goods_value as "Taxable@5:Currency:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_12_goods_value as "Taxable@12:Currency:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_18_goods_value as "Taxable@18:Currency:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_28_goods_value as "Taxable@28:Currency:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_total_cgst as "CGST:Currency:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_total_sgst as "SGST:Currency:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_total_igst as "IGST:Currency:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_freight_amount as "Freight Cost:Currency:200",
        `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_freight_taxes as "Freight GST:Currency:200",
        (`tabPurchase Invoice`.total + `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_total_cgst + `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_total_sgst + `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_total_igst + `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_freight_amount + `tabPurchase Invoice`.custom_freight_taxes) as "Total:Currency:200",
        `tabSupplier`.custom_gstin__uin as "GST Number:Data:120"
        
FROM `tabPurchase Invoice`
INNER JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item`
ON `tabPurchase Invoice`.name = `tabPurchase Invoice Item`.parent
INNER JOIN `tabSupplier` on `tabSupplier`.name = `tabPurchase Invoice`.supplier
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` AS cn
ON 
    cn.return_against = `tabPurchase Invoice`.name
group by `tabPurchase Invoice`.name
